cookiesPage.title: Cookie Settings
cookiesPage.intro: At GameSage we use cookies and similar technologies to provide you with a better experience, remember your preferences and analyze how you interact with our site. Below we explain what they are, what types we use and how you can manage them.
cookiesPage.section1_text: Cookies are small text files that websites save on your device (computer, mobile or tablet) when you visit them. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language or font size) for a period of time, so you don't have to configure them every time you return.
cookiesPage.section2_essential_text: They are necessary for the correct functioning of the website. They allow navigation, login or shopping cart management. These cookies cannot be disabled.
cookiesPage.section2_preferences_text: They allow remembering your settings, such as language, theme or type of recommendations shown by the AI.
cookiesPage.section2_analytics_text: They help us understand how users interact with the web, detect errors and improve the general experience (for example, using analytics tools).
cookiesPage.section2_marketing_text: They allow showing relevant content and offers according to your interests, inside or outside the platform.
cookiesPage.section3_text: You can accept all cookies, reject them or configure them according to your preferences. You can also modify your browser settings to block or delete cookies. Note that if you disable essential cookies, some parts of the web may not work correctly.
cookiesPage.section3_links_intro: For more information on how to manage cookies in your browser, visit the following links:
cookiesPage.section4_text: We may update this cookie policy to reflect changes in the cookies we use or for legal, operational or regulatory reasons. We recommend you review this page regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.
cookiesPage.section5_text: If you have questions about our cookie policy, contact us at:

privacyScreen.title: Privacy Policy
privacyScreen.intro: At GameSage, we take your privacy very seriously. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect your personal information when you use our platform.
privacyScreen.section1_intro: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services:

section1_list.1: Profile data: Photo, game preferences, wishlist.
section1_list.2: Usage data: Browsing history, interactions with AI, games viewed.
section1_list.3: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser.
section1_list.4: Payment data: Transaction history (we do not store full card details).

section2_list.1: Personalize your experience and game recommendations.
section2_list.3: Improve our AI and search algorithms.

privacyScreen.section2_notice: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacyScreen.section3_intro: We only share your information in limited situations:

section3_list.0: Service providers: Hosting, analytics, payment processing.
section3_list.1: Legal compliance: If required by law or competent authority.
section3_list.2: Rights protection: To protect the security of GameSage and its users.

privacyScreen.section3_notice: Links to external stores (Steam, Epic, etc.) are governed by their own privacy policies.

section4_list.0: We implement technical and organizational security measures.
section4_list.1: We use encryption to protect sensitive data.
section4_list.2: We limit access to personal information to authorized employees.

privacyScreen.section5_text: We use cookies to improve functionality and analyze usage. You can configure your browser to reject them, but some functions may not be available.
privacyScreen.section6_text: We keep your data while your account is active or necessary to comply with our legal obligations. You can request the deletion of your account at any time.
privacyScreen.section7_intro: You can exercise the following rights:

section7_list.3: Withdrawal of consent at any time.
section7_list.4: Lodging a complaint with the relevant data protection authority.

privacyScreen.section8_text: If you are under 14 years old, we require the consent of a responsible adult. Any detected data without proper authorization will be deleted immediately.
privacyScreen.section9_text: We may update this policy. We will indicate the date of change and, if necessary, notify all affected users.
privacyScreen.section10_text: For questions, concerns or additional requests:
